member.name: T:AffairesExtra.Dashboard.DashboardAttribute
member.summary: When applied to an action or a controller, intercepts any request to check whether it applies to the admin site. If so it marks the request as such and ensures the user has the right to access it.

member.name: T:AffairesExtra.Dashboard.DashboardFilter
member.summary: Intercepts any request to check whether it applies to the dashboard site. If so it marks the request as such and ensures the user as the right to access it.
